trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kings Park
There were no other sightings in Kings Park on or around March 27th 2013
Summary: Saw helicopter chasing ufo that split into two orbs over friends house It had a very very thin trail to it
divs: Sighting DetailsWas at friends house went outside to hear a helicopter that sounded liek a military one. Ive seen them come over my town before. so me and my friend wait to see this just above the trees my friend goes "WTF look!" I see this thing that looks like a star in from of the helicopter like about no more then 100ft away. It had a really really think trail coming from it. as it went straight coming about what we thought was northwest to north west. it split into two orbs one yellowish and one reddish then they the helicopter continued chase out if view. Then we go to 711 after a few minutes my freinds dad shows up and says my friends brother saw a post on FaceBook about lots of orbs over NYC.
